text: Tini'i tomaderake jale-sthale bhramana karana. Emanaki tomara yakhana nauyane arohana kara ebam segulo arohi niye anukula batase beriye yaya ebam tara tate anandita haya, tarapara yakhana damaka ha'oya ba'ite suru kare ebam caradika theke uttala tarangamala dheye ase, ara tara niscita dharana kare ye, ebara tara ghera'o haye pareche, takhana tara allah‌ke tamra jan'ya dinake ekanistha kare deke bale: ‘Apani amadera e theke bamcale amara abasya'i krtajnadera antarbhukta haba.’
